thread.section_title: Homestay.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homestay.com | homestay.com
thread.title: Tony

author: Tony
title: Tony
text:
All hotels in Cardiff were full because of England v Wales rugby. Decided to try a Homestay, Judy had great reviews and they are well deserved. Nice welcome, large comfortable bedroom, great bathroom with nice shower. Took Judy's recommendation for a local restaurant Cafe du chat noir, good French food in Welsh (generous) portions.
Great weekend topped of by England winning the match! We will stay here again.
